snippet: It pains David Graham, especially since he became a heart patient, to acknowledge that for many years, he treated golf as a matter of life or death.
abstract: David Graham, winner of 1981 United States Open, last time event was held at Merion Golf Club in Pennsylvania, will return to 2013 Open as adjunct host; Graham retired from competitive golf in 2004 after heart problems.
lead_paragraph: It pains David Graham, especially since he became a heart patient, to acknowledge that for many years, he treated golf as a matter of life or death.

headline.seo: U.S. Open — Spotlight Has Drifted Far From David Graham
headline.main: Largely Forgotten Champion, No Longer Dispassionate, Will Return as Host
headline.print_headline: Largely Forgotten Champion, No Longer Dispassionate, Will Return as Host
